dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: ...so, like, it sold for 13.5 million, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so, like, it sold for thirteen point five million, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The reported $13.5 million price was squarely within the range of what could be expected for the house.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, "sold." Right. That's, uh, that's the number they want us to believe.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, sold. Right. That's, uh, that's the number they want us to believe.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Well, I mean, Forbes did an analysis, and, um, they valued it at 13 million. That's pretty close.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, I mean, Forbes did an analysis, and, um, they valued it at thirteen million. That's pretty close.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In February, Forbes valued the property at $13 million as part of its twice-annual look at the size of Donald Trumps fortune.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, Forbes. Sure. And those "local real estate brokers," who are they, exactly? Convenient, that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, Forbes. Sure. And those local real estate brokers, who are they, exactly? Convenient, that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: No, but even Joe Babajian, from Rodeo Realty, he, uh, didn't think 13.5 million was exorbitant. He said it was definitely in the range.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but even Joe Babajian, from Rodeo Realty, he, uh, didn't think thirteen point five million was exorbitant. He said it was definitely in the range.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Even the broker who offered the lowest estimate, Joe Babajian of Rodeo Realty, said that $13.5 million was not an outrageous amount of money: Its definitely in the range.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: "In the range?" After, uh, someone couldn't even sell it months before? Come on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: In the range? After, uh, someone couldn't even sell it months before? Come on.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: She said one of her colleagues tried to sell Trumps house a few months ago. He couldnt sell it, or he didnt have enough showings.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Mitra Sisatar said her colleague had trouble, yes, but she still believed 13.5 million was within the expected range for the property.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mitra Sisatar said her colleague had trouble, yes, but she still believed thirteen point five million was within the expected range for the property.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Even so, Sisatar said, $13.5 million was within the range someone might expect for the property.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: But she also said the new buyer, uh, "came out of the blue," and made the sale "more suspect." That's a direct quote.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But she also said the new buyer, uh, came out of the blue, and made the sale more suspect. That's a direct quote.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article does not contain the quotes "came out of the blue" or "more suspect" attributed to Mitra Sisatar or any other broker.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but, like, the market shifts. He bought it for seven million in 2007, you can't compare those numbers directly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but, like, the market shifts. He bought it for seven million in two thousand seven, you can't compare those numbers directly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Yes, Trump bought the place for $7 million in 2007.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: So it's just a coincidence that this "out of the blue" buyer is, uh, Trump's Indonesian business partner, Tanoesoedibjo?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it's just a coincidence that this out of the blue buyer is, uh, Trump's Indonesian business partner, Tanoesoedibjo?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tanoesoedibjo is an Indonesian business partner of Donald Trump, with his own ambitions for political office. ... If Tanoesoedibjo is in fact the buyer, the recent sale would seem to violate Trumps pledge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Well, his lawyer pledged no new foreign deals during the presidency, sure, but...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, his lawyer pledged no new foreign deals during the presidency, sure, but...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Shortly before Trumps inauguration, his lawyer promised no new foreign deals will be made whatsoever during the duration of President Trumps presidency.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And this is, uh, Tanoesoedibjo, who has his own political ambitions. So it's not just about a house, is it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And this is, uh, Tanoesoedibjo, who has his own political ambitions. So it's not just about a house, is it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tanoesoedibjo is an Indonesian business partner of Donald Trump, with his own ambitions for political office.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, some brokers did speculate that the prestige of acquiring a property from the U.S. president might, you know, inflate the price slightly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, some brokers did speculate that the prestige of acquiring a property from the U.S. president might, you know, inflate the price slightly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Another local broker, Ernie Carswell, agreed: I believe it sold at the slight premium simply because of who the seller was.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: 'Slightly'? We're talking about, uh, a pledge broken and, like, a history of these kinds of deals.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: 'Slightly'? We're talking about, uh, a pledge broken and, like, a history of these kinds of deals.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Not that it would be the first time Trump crossed that line. The president has counted state-owned banks from China and India as tenants in two of his buildings. And last year, he even sold a Las Vegas condo to someone with a listed address in Taiyuan City, China.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Still, if he settles his taxes on the profit, the transaction could potentially reduce his net worth, not increase it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, if he settles his taxes on the profit, the transaction could potentially reduce his net worth, not increase it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If President Trump pays taxes on his apparent $6.5 million gain, his recent transaction could actually knock down his estimated net worth rather than boost it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, now it's about his taxes. Convenient. What about the optics? What about the promise?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, now it's about his taxes. Convenient. What about the optics? What about the promise?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: I'm just saying, it's not an open-and-shut case of, like, definite overpaying, objectively.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm just saying, it's not an open-and-shut case of, like, definite overpaying, objectively.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The truth is, no one did. The reported $13.5 million price was squarely within the range of what could be expected for the house.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's an open-and-shut case of, uh, another deeply questionable transaction.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's an open-and-shut case of, uh, another deeply questionable transaction.
